description: This is a storage area of the elven home.  Sacks of flour cover one side
and cleaning accessories cover the other side.  There appears to be nothing
else of note here.  A staircase leads up.
7839.name: The Storage Room

description: You see the second floor.
The building continues to the west.
The building continues to the south.
The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.
7830.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: You see the trail.
You see the trail.
This secluded valley is surrounded on all sides by a rocky ridge which
protects it from harsh weather and many outside visitors.  To the east
there stands a large wooden building that appears to be some type of
communal living home.
7832.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: You see the trail.
You see the trail.
A relatively well-trodden path leads north toward the ridge overlooking
a valley and south toward the Plains of Ofcol.  Much more faint and narrow
paths branch off toward the west and east, heading around the ridge of
the valley.
7801.name: Along the Path

description: You see the overlook.
You see the small trail.
You see the small trail.
You see the path back toward Ofcol.
A narrow game trail works its way along the ridge overlooking the
Valley of the Elves.  The valley below appears green and vibrant
with several scattered stands of trees.  It would be easy to drop
down the ledge into the valley but impossible to climb back up here.
7863.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.
7821.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues east.
The valley continues west.
The valley continues south.
The sounds of birds and insects float on the air as the surrounding grass
of the Valley of the Elves swishes in a natural rhythm.  The temperature in
the valley seems to always stay temperate.  It is unclear if that is a result
of the unique geography of the area or an act of magic.
7826.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The trail leads back to the valley.
The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  To the south is the outside
wall of a large wooden building.
7843.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: You see the trail.
You see the trail.
A narrow cobblestone road leads north and south through the Valley
of the Elves.  All around lush green grasses grow, dotted with stands
of trees and patches of wildflowers.
7812.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues west.
The sounds of birds and insects float on the air as the surrounding grass
of the Valley of the Elves swishes in a natural rhythm.  The temperature in
the valley seems to always stay temperate.  It is unclear if that is a result
of the unique geography of the area or an act of magic.
7807.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The valley continues north.
The entrance to the valley is to the west.
This room looks like it is used for magical studies.  Potions bubble over
burners and the whole room smells of herbs and dead animal flesh.  A furnace
to the side casts a bright light in this room.  The whole room radiates with
a magical aura.
7881.name: The Workroom

description: This faint trail leads around the rocky rim overlooking a lush green
valley below.  It is known as the Valley of the Elves, due to a small
settlement of rather reclusive elves that live there.  It is possible
to drop down the ridge into the valley but not to climb back up.
7852.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: This road leads east/west through the wide open Valley of the Elves.
To the west there is an opening in the ridge surrounding the valley
and beyond, a settlement of some type.  The rest of the valley lies
to the east.
7813.name: {*[{GElven Vi{glla{Gge Road{*]{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues east.
The valley continues south.
A narrow game trail works its way along the ridge overlooking the
Valley of the Elves.  The valley below appears green and vibrant
with several scattered stands of trees.  It would be easy to drop
down the ledge into the valley but impossible to climb back up here.
7850.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: The aged cobblestones of the Elven Valley Road lead through sparse
and rocky hillsides here.  To the south, lies the Valley of the Elves,
home to a private group of elven residents who live amongst the
wildlife.
7885.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x

description: This is a study room in the communal house of the valley elves.
Comfortable mats sit on the floor and there are musical instruments
neatly stacked on shelves.  Books in strange languages line even
more shelves.  A stairway leads down to the first floor.
7848.name: Study

description: You see another room.
You see the first floor.
This faint trail leads around the rocky rim overlooking a lush green
valley below.  It is known as the Valley of the Elves, due to a small
settlement of rather reclusive elves that live there.  It is possible
to drop down the ridge into the valley but not to climb back up.
7862.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: The valley continues to the north.
The valley continues to the west.
This is a community home of the valley elves.  The building continues to
the north and east.  The exit is to the south.
7834.name: The Elf Home

description: The building continues to the north.
The building continues to the east.
The exit is to the south.
This secluded valley is surrounded on all sides by a rocky ridge which
protects it from harsh weather and many outside visitors.  To the west
there stands a large wooden building that appears to be some type of
communal living home.
7840.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: You see the trail.
You see the trail.
This large pond divides the secluded valley, stretching from the
northern ridge of the valley all the way to the southern.  The waters
are still and completely dark, making the depth seem eternal.  A complete
silence pervades the area, as if any sound is absorbed by the dark pond
itself.
7868.name: {BOn The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x

description: Strange visions swirl within the sphere but nothing seems to come into focus.
Strange visions swirl within the sphere but nothing seems to come into focus.
This is the private room for the elders of the valley elves.  Many books
written in obscure languages line numerous shelves and there is a long
table absolutely covered in scrolls.  There is a smooth, spheric object
in the center of the room that serves an unknown purpose.
7845.name: The Elders' Room

description: You see another room.
You see another room.
The Elven Valley road runs north and south here through the
countryside.  The terrain is rather barren but in the distance
to the north can be seen an intersection in the road.  Some ways
to the south is a tall rocky ridge.
7886.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x

description: The cobblestone road that leads through the Valley of the Elves and
the small elven settlement peters out here.  The stone pavement
becomes more and more broken until it is really nothing more than a
dirt path.  The settlement and valley can be found to the east.
7895.name: {*[{GElven Vi{glla{Gge Road{*]{x

description: The road leading north and south through the valley isn't so much
paved as it is just a narrow path of well-worn rocks and gravel.
Tall grasses lead in all directions, dotted with the occasional tree.
7827.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x

description: This is a narrow, winding trail following along the rim of the Valley
of the Elves.  Below can be see the valley, filled with wild flowers
and tall, green grasses.  It looks like it would be possible to slide
down the ridge toward the valley but not to climb back up.
7854.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: The sounds of birds and insects float on the air as the surrounding grass
of the Valley of the Elves swishes in a natural rhythm.  The temperature in
the valley seems to always stay comfortable.  Directly east stands a large
wooden building that looks to be able to house quite an extended family.
7837.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: You see the trail.
You see the trail.
The sounds of birds and insects float on the air as the surrounding grass

7809.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

The valley continues east.
The valley continues west.
The valley continues south.
This faint trail leads around the rocky rim overlooking a lush green
valley below.  To the east is a rope bridge spanning a break in the
ridge.  To the north, a broader path branches from the trail.  It is
also possible to drop off the ridge down into the valley but it would
be too difficult to climb back up.
7855.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: The waters of this large pond are completely dark and absolutely still,
making it impossible to determine its depth.  The mirror-like surface of
the water reflects the sky above, yet seems to suck any light or color
beneath the depths.  The pond reaches all the way across the secluded
valley.
7883.name: {BOn The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x

This small shop is filled with rows upon rows of bottles.  Each bottle
contains a different colored liquid, some shimmering, some bubbling, but
all with a distinct aura of magic.  There is a work table in the back
with many tins and glass beakers sitting upon it.  To see the stats of
any item for sale, simply {Ylook{x at it.

The valley continues east.
The valley continues west.
The valley continues south.
Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.
7818.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues east.
The valley continues west.
The valley continues south.
This is a large, hollowed out cavern with a tunnel leading to the north.
All the walls are charred and this room is filled with a smell close to
that of burning tar.  This appears to be the den for a fiery creature,
most likely used as some type of guardian.  There is a door set into the
wall to the west and some cracks in the rock to the east.
7880.name: The Den of the Pyrohydra

description: You see the relative safety to the north.
You see breaks in the charred rock to the east.
You see a door to the west.
This is the inside of a small wooden shack.  It looks like this meager
shelter was lashed together using nothing more than rope and spare wood.
A small stove sits to one side, with soup cooking atop it.  There is a
foul, musty smell hanging in the air.  A ratty old rug lays slightly
askew on the floor.
7878.name: Inside the Small Shack

description: You see a trap door!
This well maintained cobblestone road leads east and west through
the outskirts of the small elven settlement off of the main valley.
To the south, there is a building that looks like a small home.
7894.name: {*[{GElven Vi{glla{Gge Road{*]{x

description: A broad dirt path leads north and south here through a grassy
field.  To the south can be seen a rocky ridge overlooking a
valley of some sort.  To the north is an imposing and dense
forest of tall trees.
7856.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: The trail down doesn't look safe to travel on at all.
This secluded valley is surrounded on all sides by a rocky ridge which
protects it from harsh weather and many outside visitors.  To the south
there stands a large wooden building that appears to be some type of
communal living home.
7842.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: You see the trail.
You see the trail.
A small path that appears to be nothing more than a game trail curves
north and east.  To the north is a ridge overlooking a valley, to the

7802.name: A Small Trail

The main path is to the east.

description: This road leads north and south through the wide open Valley of the

The valley continues east.
The valley continues west.
The valley continues south.
This appears to be the sleeping quarters of the valley elves.  Cots are
lined up in rows alongside two windows showing a beautiful view of the
expanse of the valley below.  There are doors leading east and south.
7847.name: The Sleeping Quarters

description: You see another room.

This secluded valley is surrounded on all sides by a rocky ridge which

7823.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The valley continues east.
The valley continues south
Tall stands of trees are all about in this secluded sub-section of
the Valley of the Elves.  There is a general feeling of arcane energy
in the air and the natural elements in the area seem strengthened,
and perhaps a bit twisted, by it.  The valley is surrounded by rock
ledges, making it difficult to get in and out of.
7890.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x

description: The sounds of nature seem somehow harsher and more amplified in this
small, secluded valley off the main Valley of the Elves.  There are
several tall trees spread throughout the valley, despite the relative
darkness cast by the rocky ridges surrounding the area.
7889.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x

description: This path leads north, away from the Plains of Ofcol.  The path doesn't
look often traveled, but it is relatively well kept.  To the south are the
plains, and beyond, the city of Westbridge.
7800.name: A Path from the Plains

description: The path continues north.
You see the Plains of Ofcol.
Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.
7808.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues east.
The living room of the elven home.  Mats cover the floor, and there is
a table in the middle with bowl full of fruit.  Through the window can
be seen the valley, with its wild flowers and tall, green grasses.
7838.name: The Living Room

description: The building continues to the east.
The entrance is to the south.
This faint trail leads around the rocky rim overlooking a lush green
valley below.  It is known as the Valley of the Elves, due to a small
settlement of rather reclusive elves that live there.  It is possible
to drop down the ridge into the valley but not to climb back up.
7849.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: This is a community kitchen for the valley elven home.  Pots and pans line
the walls, along with shelves filled with foodstuffs.  A big oven sits to one
side, whithin which elfcakes are being baked.  The home continues to the north
and to the west.
7835.name: The Kitchen

description: The building continues to the north.

This large shop almost looks like a library.  There are rows upon rows
of tall wooden shelves, all filled with very neatly organized scroll
casings.  Despite the vastness of the merchandise, there is not a single
speck of dust to be found anywhere.  You may {Ylook{x at any item that's for
sale to see the stats on it.
7874.name: {GSy{glvan{yic {*Scri{wbe{x

description: The valley continues to the east.
{x
{gA terrace{Gd {Wsquare mark{ws the center of this sma{Wll elven village.  The{x
{gsquare {Gis{W paved in b{weautiful white marble an{Wd several potted trees and{x
{gflowe{Gri{Wng bushes a{wre placed all about.  On{W a raised tier in the center{x
{gof {Gth{We square is{w a beautiful fountain.  {WA shop stands to the north and{x
{gt{Ghe{W square con{wtinues to the west and s{Wouth.{x
7871.name: {*[{GElven Vi{gllage Sq{Guare{*]{x

description: The valley continues to the west.
The valley continues to the south.
The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.
7833.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: You see the trail.
You see the trail.
A small path that appears to be nothing more than a game trail curves
north and west.  To the north is a ridge overlooking a valley, to the
west is a much wider path.
7803.name: A Small Trail

description: The trail continues north.
The main path is to the west.
Here is an intersection in the narrow cobblestone road that runs
through the valley.  The main road leads north and south.  It also
branches west where it heads toward a small village.
7817.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues west.
The valley continues south.
{x
{gA terrace{Gd {Wsquare mark{ws the center of this sma{Wll elven village.  The{x
{gsquare {Gis{W paved in b{weautiful white marble an{Wd several potted trees and{x
{gflowe{Gri{Wng bushes a{wre placed all about.  On{W a raised tier in the center{x
{gof {Gth{We square is{w a beautiful fountain.  {WA shop stands to the west and{x
{gt{Ghe{W square con{wtinues to the east and s{Wouth.{x
7873.name: {*[{GElven Vi{gllage Sq{Guare{*]{x

description: The valley continues to the east.
The valley continues to the west.
This well maintained cobblestone road leads east and west through
the outskirts of the small elven settlement off of the main valley.
To the north, there is a building that looks like a small home.
7893.name: {*[{GElven Vi{glla{Gge Road{*]{x

description: The sounds of birds and insects float on the air as the surrounding grass
of the Valley of the Elves swishes in a natural rhythm.  The temperature in
the valley seems to always stay temperate.  It is unclear if that is a result
of the unique geography of the area or an act of magic.
7891.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: A narrow game trail works its way along the ridge overlooking the
Valley of the Elves.  The valley below appears green and vibrant
with several scattered stands of trees.  It would be easy to drop
down the ledge into the valley but impossible to climb back up here.
7866.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: This road leads west and east through the wide open Valley of the
Elves.  All about can be heard the vibrant sounds of nature.  Birdsong
floats on the warm breeze while insects hum and chirp.
7815.name: {*[{GElven Vi{glla{Gge Road{*]{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues east.
The valley continues west.
The valley continues south.
The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.
7805.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The valley continues north.
The valley continues east.
The valley continues west.
A narrow game trail works its way along the ridge overlooking the
Valley of the Elves.  The valley below appears green and vibrant
with several scattered stands of trees.  It would be easy to drop
down the ledge into the valley but impossible to climb back up here.
7860.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: This is a small storage room.  There are several boxes stacked
about and shelves holding plain clothing.  A fine layer of dust
has settled over everything, seeming to indicate that people don't
often come in here.
7846.name: The Storage Room

description: You see another room.
This faint trail leads around the rocky rim overlooking a lush green
valley below.  It is known as the Valley of the Elves, due to a small
settlement of rather reclusive elves that live there.  It is possible
to drop down the ridge into the valley but not to climb back up.
7865.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: This is a damp, earthen tunnel.  Despite being underground, the tunnel
feels unnaturally warm.  A ladder leads up toward the small shack which
appears to just be a ruse for disguising this passage.  The tunnel leads
south.
7879.name: Beneath the Small Shack

description: Back to known territory!
The room looks reddish down there.
This underground room appears to be used to store scrolls, potions, and
other magical items.  The whole area radiates with a magical aura.
7882.name: The Storage Room

description: A rustic cobblestone road leads north and south through a rocky
pass.  To the south can be seen an opening into a lush green valley.
To the north, the road continues toward an intersection.
7884.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x

description: This secluded valley is surrounded on all sides by a rocky ridge which
protects it from harsh weather and many outside visitors.  There is a group
of elves who call this valley home, however, caution is warranted as they are
notorious for being distrustful of outsiders.
7806.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x

description: The valley continues north.
The entrance to the valley is to the east.
The old yet well constructed cobblestone Elven Valley Road leads
north and south here.  To the north, is the intersection with the
lesser maintained Elven Valley Roadway.  To the south, the road
leads toward the Valley of the Elves.
7887.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x

description: This faint trail leads around the rocky rim overlooking a lush green
valley below.  To the east is a rope bridge spanning a break in the
ridge which serves as an outlet for the valley below.  It is possible
to drop down the ridge into the valley but not to climb back up.
7859.name: A Trail on the Rim of the Valley

description: You see a rope bridge.
This is a rocky overlook high above a small valley.  Below, rich green
grass covers the valley, with some small trees dotting the landscape.  To
the south is the trail back toward the plains and Westbridge beyond.  A
narrow cobblestone road leads steeply down from the overlook toward the
valley below.
7804.name: The Overlook

description: You see the path back toward Ofcol.
A well made rope bridge spans a break in the ridge that surrounds
the valley below.  From here, it is possible see the whole Valley of
the Elves.  Directly south is see the main valley but to the southwest
there appears to be a passage to a smaller valley.  In the southeastern
section of the main valley there is a large wooden house and a road
passes directly below the bridge.  A rope ladder leads down to the road.
7858.name: On the Rope Bridge

description: This well maintained cobblestone road leads east and west through
the small elven settlement.  A short ways east lies a village square.
To the south, there is a building that looks like a small home.
7892.name: {*[{GElven Vi{glla{Gge Road{*]{x

description:
This elf looks quite old, probably 800 years or more.  Despite her advanced
age she still appears quite potent.
7808.room_name: A valley elf elder is here, studying.
7808.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {Welder{x~

description:
This big beast looks like a small red dragon, but has many more heads than a
regular dragon.  It doesn't look happy.
7809.room_name: A big beast with many heads, each breathing fire, stands guard here.
7809.name: {rthe {Rpy{Yr{ro{Rhy{rd{Yr{Ra{x~

description:
This man looks very old and feeble.  Judging from the condition of
his clothes, the length of his filthy beard, and the semi-crazed
look in his eyes, he has not seen another person in some time.
7810.room_name: An old hermit sits here, smoking a pipe.
7810.name: an {*o{Wl{wd {Wh{*er{wm{*i{Wt{x~

description:
At first glance, the mage, Talemon, might appear to be harmless.
He wear long blue robes, adorned with arcane runes, with the hood
pulled up over his head.  However, one look into his hard gray eyes
reveals a merciless intensity that cannot be mistaken.
7811.room_name: An old mage busies himself with some arcane experiments.
7811.name: {cT{wa{Blem{wo{cn{x~

description:
This demon is large, with pitch black wings and glowing red eyes.
The smell of sulfur radiates off its scaly hide.  It looks quite
unhappy with its summoned job and is willing to take out its anger
on any who enter its room.
7812.room_name: A huge demon is here, guarding the room.
7812.name: {*a gua{rrd{Rian {rde{*mon{x~

description:
The wolf is small and a bit mangy, covered in mottled brown
hair.  It looks about with wary eyes, searching out some easy
prey for a quick meal.
7813.room_name: A small wolf is here, looking for easy prey.
7813.name: a small {ybrown {xwolf~

description:
This stout creature has large horns and whitish spots over coarse,
brown hair.  This game most likely sustains not only the elves of
the valley, but many other wild creatures.
7814.room_name: An antelope is here, peacefully munching on grass.
7814.name: an {yan{wt{We{wl{yope{x~

description:
If you are not an immortal you should not be seeing this mob.  If
you do, it is a bug.  Please report it.
7815.name: IMP INVIS stove mob~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M act 7800 from the large oven~
M act 7800 opens the large oven~

description:
This tall and slender elven woman has long auburn hair that flows
down over her simple white robes.  Yulna knows all there is to know
about potion concoction and seems able to whip up anything that anyone
could ask for.  She eyes any strangers that come into her shop warily.
7816.room_name: A slender elven woman stands here, cautiously watching for customers.
7816.name: {cYul{Cna{x, the potion mistress~

description:
This man is quite tall for an elf and has a long, whispy white beard.
He strolls the aisles of his shop with a white cloth, polishing the
scroll cases as he waits for customers to make a purchase.
7817.room_name: A tall elven man with a long white beard waits for customers.
7817.name: {*Pary{wmo{x, the master scribe~

description:
This citizen of the elven village goes about their business quietly,
all the while looking about suspiciously at any outsiders.  They may
give a distrustful gaze to outsiders but they don't bother taking any
action unless provoked.
7818.room_name: A citizen of the elven village goes about their business.
7818.name: {yan {gelven {yvillager{x~

description:
This bear is of average size and appears to be rather calm, almost
docile.  It spends its time foraging for grubs and roots, paying
practically no heed to what goes on around it so long as its not
disturbed.
7819.room_name: An average sized brown bear forages for grubs.
7819.name: {ya brown bear{x~

description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and
more agile.  The guardian stands watch over the most revered elders
in the clan.
7820.room_name: A valley elf guardian stands here, ready to protect the elders.
7820.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {bguardian{x~

description:
If you are not an immortal you should not be seeing this mob.  If
you do, it is a bug.  Please report it.
7821.name: IMP INVIS demon spawner~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M greet 7805 100~
M random 7807 5~

description:
A beast is the size of the largest common dog.  It has a greenish coat with
brown spots.  Its shape, along with its colors, make this cooshee almost
undetectable as it moves.
7800.room_name: A rather large dog is here, wandering the valley.
7800.name: {ga {yc{goos{yhe{ge{x~

description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and more
agile.  There is a deep distrust in his eyes.  He goes about his business
swiftly and quietly while avoiding any contact with strangers.
7801.room_name: A male valley elf wanders here, wary of any intrusion.
7801.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf{x~

description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and more
agile.  There is a deep distrust in her eyes.  She goes about her business
swiftly and quietly while avoiding any contact with strangers.
7802.room_name: A female valley elf wanders here, wary of any intrusion.
7802.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf{x~

description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and
more agile.  His hard eyes scan his surroundings, watching for any
disturbance.
7803.room_name: A valley elf sentry stands here, ready to attack any intruders.
7803.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {*sentry{x~

description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and
more agile.  Her hard eyes scan her surroundings, watching for any
disturbance.
7804.room_name: A valley elf sentry stands here, ready to attack any intruders.
7804.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {*sentry{x~

description:
This elf is quick to notice any changes in the valley and is tasked with
reporting findings back to the elders.
7805.room_name: A valley elf scout wanders the valley, taking note of anything unusual.
7805.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {yscout{x~

description:
This elf is very busy doing some menial chores.  She ignores intruders except
if they get in her way.
7806.room_name: A valley elf maid is here, doing her chores.
7806.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {wmaid{x~

description:
This elf looks quite old, probably 800 years or more.  Despite his advanced
age he still appears quite potent.
7807.room_name: A valley elf elder is here, studying.
7807.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {Welder{x~
